channel.title: CVE Feed for DynamicWebLab -- WordPress Team Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for DynamicWebLab -- WordPress Team Manager

item.title: CVE-2024-38704|2024-08-02T04:19:20.228Z -- dynamicweblab -- wordpress%20team%20manager
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in DynamicWebLab WordPress Team Manager allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects WordPress Team Manager: from n/a through 2.1.12.
